infoIntro: Octet Nova is a small independent video game development studio.
gamesIntro: Discover our original creations, designed with passion and innovation.
gamesTitleSpaceSinking1:
Space Sinking 1
The Beginning of a Space Adventure
gamesDescSpaceSinking1: Dive into the universe of Space Sinking 1, a space adventure game where you play as a brave pilot.
gamesDescSpaceSinking2: Join us for the epic sequel with Space Sinking 2.
gamesTitleCoC:
Case of Curse
A thrilling adventure
gamesDescCoC: An abnormal number of maledictions started to spread in the kingdom and as a magician's assistant you need to manage the office alone since he needs to go help in the capital
aboutIntro: Octet Nova is a collective specialized in designing independent games.
contactIntro: OctetNova is a small collective of young students passionate about computer science.
formStatusSuccess: Thank you! Your message has been sent.
formEmailSubject: New message from {name} via the OctetNova website
formEmailIntro: You have received a new message through the contact form on your site.
formEmailFooter: This email was sent automatically from the octetnova.fr website.
gameCarouselDesc1Sps1: In 2242, humanity has exhausted Earth's resources. You are a 'Sinker', an elite pilot sent to the far reaches of the galaxy to find a new planet.
gameCarouselDesc1Sps2: In 2242, humanity has exhausted Earth's resources. You are a 'Sinker', an elite pilot sent to the far reaches of the galaxy to find a new planet.
gameCarouselDesc1Coc: An unusually high number of curses have begun to spread throughout the kingdom, and as the assistant to a wizard, you must manage the office alone while he heads to the capital to help.
gameIntroP1Sps1: Space Sinking 1 is an open-world action RPG where you command the 'Stardust Drifter', humanity's last hope. Navigate through unstable subspace portals to map unknown sectors of the galaxy.
gameIntroP1Sps2: Space Sinking 1 is an open-world action RPG where you command the 'Stardust Drifter', humanity's last hope. Navigate through unstable subspace portals to map unknown sectors of the galaxy.
gameIntroP1Coc: An unusually high number of curses have begun to spread throughout the kingdom, and as the assistant to a wizard, you must manage the office alone while he heads to the capital to help.
gameIntroP2Sps1: Fight pirate factions, uncover the ruins of ancient civilizations, and make decisions that will directly impact the course of the story. Your journey is just beginning.
gameIntroP2Sps2: Fight pirate factions, uncover the ruins of ancient civilizations, and make decisions that will directly impact the course of the story. Your journey is just beginning.
gameIntroP2Coc: An unusually high number of curses have begun to spread throughout the kingdom, and as the assistant to a wizard, you must manage the office alone while he heads to the capital to help.
feature1DescSps1: No two journeys are alike. Explore billions of unique star systems.
feature1DescSps2: No two journeys are alike. Explore billions of unique star systems.

ctaTitle2: Want to see the game's source code?
ctaDescSps1: Your adventures at the edge of the universe await. Launch the game directly from your browser.
